entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
